summary: Young siblings Abby and Ethan are adopted by outwardly perfect parents Eve and Raymond Goode, only to find that that their new guardian's remote mansion is far from the idyllic abode that it initially appears to be.
cast: Angie Harmon|Joel Gretsch|Jordan Danger|Bobby Coleman|Jason London|Tasha Smith|Tim Cooney|Adam Tomei|Robert Merrill|Cyia Batten
keywords: looking at oneself in a mirror|shooting a woman|mansion|orphan|lake
title: Última sospecha 2
